name: nprmi
params: class c0, class c1, class c2

stmt.origin: mtbi(wcel(c0, cprime), wcel(co(c1, cmul, c2), cprime))

body.origin:
|- wn(wcel(c0, cprime))
-| wn(wcel(co(c1, cmul, c2), cprime))
-| wb(wcel(co(c1, cmul, c2), cprime), wcel(c0, cprime))
body.pretty:
⊢ ¬ c0 ∈ Prime
⊣ ¬(c1[×]c2)∈ Prime
⊣ ((c1[×]c2)∈ Prime ↔ c0 ∈ Prime)
